SELECT d.id id, d.`name` `name`, d.descp descp, CASE WHEN d.`level` = '0' THEN '底' WHEN d.`level` = '1' THEN '中' WHEN d.`level` = '2' THEN '高' WHEN d.`level` = '3' THEN '紧急' ELSE '' END level, d.drafted_account_id draftedAccountId, d.drafted_employee_name draftedEmployeeName, d.callon_account_id callonAccountId, d.callon_employee_name callonEmployeeName, CASE WHEN d.`status` = '0' THEN '已取消' WHEN d.`status` = '1' THEN '已关闭' WHEN d.`status` = '2' THEN '待处理' WHEN d.`status` = '3' THEN '处理中' WHEN d.`status` = '4' THEN '已完成' ELSE '' END status, substring(d.create_time,1,10) createTime, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(employee_name) from (SELECT de.*,pe.employee_name FROM bug_info de LEFT JOIN product_employee pe ON de.relation_id = pe.product_id and de.relation_type='1' and pe.employee_type='1' ) as prod_emp where d.id=id GROUP BY id) productManager, p.`name` productName, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(employee_name) from (SELECT de.*,pe.employee_name FROM bug_info de LEFT JOIN program_employee pe ON de.relation_id = pe.program_id and de.relation_type='2' and pe.employee_type='1' ) as prog_emp where d.id=id GROUP BY id) programManager, m.`name` programName, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(content) from (SELECT de.*,CONCAT(dc.create_time,' ',dc.employee_name,':',dc.content) 'content' FROM bug_info de LEFT JOIN bug_comment dc ON de.id = dc.bug_id) as dem_com where d.id=id GROUP BY id) comment from bug_info d LEFT JOIN product p ON d.relation_id = p.id and d.relation_type='1' LEFT JOIN program m on d.relation_id = m.id and d.relation_type='2' WHERE 1=1
and d.status in
#{item}
and d.channel = #{channel}
and d.callon_account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and d.drafted_account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and
(
(d.relation_type = 1 AND d.relation_id IN ( SELECT ta.id FROM product ta LEFT JOIN product_employee tb ON ta.id = tb.product_id WHERE (tb.account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR ta.contact_account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR ta.type=1) AND product_id = #{productId} ))
OR ( d.relation_type = 2 AND d.relation_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT p.id FROM program p JOIN program_employee pe ON p.id = pe.program_id WHERE (pe.account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR p.type = 1) AND product_id = #{productId} ) ))
and d.relation_type = 2 AND d.relation_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT p.id FROM program p JOIN program_employee pe ON p.id = pe.program_id WHERE (pe.account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR p.type = 1) AND product_id = #{productId} AND relation_id = #{programId} )
and (( d.relation_type = 1 AND d.relation_id IN ( SELECT ta.id FROM product ta LEFT JOIN product_employee tb ON ta.id = tb.product_id WHERE (tb.account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR ta.contact_account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR ta.type=1) ) ) OR ( d.relation_type = 2 AND d.relation_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT p.id FROM program p JOIN program_employee pe ON p.id = pe.program_id WHERE (pe.account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR p.type = 1) )) OR d.callon_account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR d.drafted_account_id = #{accountId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
and
(
(d.relation_type = 1 AND d.relation_id = #{productId})
OR ( d.relation_type = 2 AND d.relation_id IN (SELECT id FROM program WHERE product_id = #{productId}) ))
and d.relation_type = 2 AND d.relation_id = #{programId}
and (d.name like concat(concat('%',#{searchText}),'%') OR d.callon_employee_name like concat(concat('%',#{searchText}),'%'))
